question: 商店街
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>merchandise</kanji> <kanji>shop</kanji> <kanji>street</kanji> is a street with all kinds of shops and merchandise on it. Sounds like a lot of shopping goes on here in this <vocabulary>shopping district</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
